This #Pride month we honor the courageous protesters such as Marsha P. Johnson and Sylvia Rivera who paved the way for more than half a century of progress.

Letâ€™s celebrate how far we've come and recommit to continuing our work for full equality.

53 years ago, the LGBTQ community stood up to police violence and anti-LGBTQ laws after the NYPD raided the Stonewall Inn in New York City.

The protests that followed became a rallying cry for the nascent LGBTQ rights movement. #Pride2022 https://t.co/SeKorGI9ZC

Today I held a virtual town hall meeting with @RepThompson to discuss actions to save lives and reduce gun violence.
